Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-01: Does your company own the physical data center where the Institution's data will reside?

Question: DCTR-02: Does the hosting provider have a SOC 2 Type 2 report available?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-03: Are the data centers staffed 24 hours a day, seven days a week (i.e., 24x7x365)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-04: Do any of your servers reside in a co-located data center?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-05: Are your servers separated from other companies via a physical barrier, such as a cage or hardened walls?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-06: Does a physical barrier fully enclose the physical space preventing unauthorized physical contact with any of your devices?

Question: DCTR-07: Select the option that best describes the network segment that servers are connected to.

Question: DCTR-08: Does this data center operate outside of the Institution's Data Zone?

Question: DCTR-09: Will any institution data leave the Institution's Data Zone?

Question: DCTR-10: List all datacenters and the cities, states (provinces), and countries where the Institution's data will be stored (including within the Institution's Data Zone).

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-11: Are your primary and secondary data centers geographically diverse?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-12: If outsourced or co-located, is there a contract in place to prevent data from leaving the Institution's Data Zone?

Question: DCTR-13: What Tier Level is your data center (per levels defined by the Uptime Institute)?

Question: DCTR-14: Is the service hosted in a high availability environment?

Question: DCTR-15: Is redundant power available for all datacenters where institution data will reside?

Question: DCTR-16: Are redundant power strategies tested?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Datacenter (v2.11)
Question: DCTR-17: Describe or provide a reference to the availability of cooling and fire suppression systems in all datacenters where institution data will reside.
